scenario_text.value: Find anything, Minoru?

Hey, Takuma! It totally sucked,
unfortunately...

There was nothing to search because the
underground waterway was full of fog.

We couldn’t even get inside, so we gave up
and left.

What’s going on with this fog everywhere all
of a sudden, anyway?

I should head back to the school, huh? Gotta
tell everyone about the fog...
Sounds wise to me. How about you, Takuma?
Um, sure.
(Minoru’s acting different than usual.)

(I don’t remember him ever suggesting what to
do like this.)

(He always says and does what he wants. Never
suggests, or bothers to ask permission.)
(It’s kinda...nice to see, actually.)
What’s up? You’re totally spacing out.
Oh, um...
(How should I respond to Minoru?)
I really trust you.
You’re different...
Nothing.
I really trust you.

You’ve gotten more independent, and I feel
like I can really trust you now.

What the hell makes you say that all of
a sudden?

Minoru has grown stronger on the inside.
I feel the same way.

Will you guys cut it out?! This isn’t the
time to get all sentimental!

Sorry, sorry! Anyway, I approve of your
proposal.
A’ight. It’s off to the school, then!
You’re different...
Something seems different about you, Minoru.
Huh? Like how?

Like, the way you articulated your opinion so
clearly.

You make it sound like I’ve been a total
flake this whole time.

I mean, I kinda have been... But I’ve gotten
more mature now!

Anyway, we’ll look around a little more and
then head back to the school.
Nothing.

Oh, nothing. I just got lost in my feelings
for a second there.
What the hell? Are you worn out or something?
Maybe I am...

Then maybe you should head back before us and
get some rest?

We’ll go back as soon as we finish here. Get
some rest before you collapse.
All right! See you later then.

What’s with all this fog? Kaito better be
okay, wherever he is...
